messages.subject: Investments
messages.body:
URGENT AND STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL
FROM:MR EMMANUEL KAMARA
TEL:+225 07 67 99 39
ABIDJAN,COTE D IVOIRE
WEST-AFRICA.



DEAR



Iam contacting you because of my intention to invest
my money in your country through a reputable person
like you into private research institute.


My late father was the export manager of Sierra-Leone Diamond-mine before he
was assasinated by the gun men,who we suspected to be the members of the
Revolutionary United Front rebels R.U.F that were attacking the government of
my country by then.


My late father deposited the sum of Eighteen
Million,Six Hundred Thousand Dollas $18.6m in a
Security Company in Abidjan,Cote d Ivoire here.


Iam making an arrangement ,so that we move this money
out of here through your assistance as the beneficiary
of the fund.I need your assistance because if the
Security company discovers that the content of the consignment is money,they
may try to share it with me since my father who deposited it is dead.But if i
tell them that the box belongs to my late fathers associate,they will stay
clear.


My late father used this Security Company to export
Diamond to Europe through their Diplomatic channel
when he was alife.


Please, you have to work with me with honesty because
right now,i am staying in the house of a humanitarian
who worked in the refugee camp.I moved into the
refugee camp after the attack of the rebels in our
home in my country Sierra-Leone.It was these rebels
that assasinated my father and looted all our
property.All my future now lies on this fund which was deposited by my late
father in a Security Company down here.


Please,let me know your advice on how best we can
invest this money in your country.Your persentage for
your assistance will be 20% of the total money and 10%
will be for expenses made in the process of this
transaction from the both parties.


This business is risk free,you have to contact me
immediately.


Thanks as i expect your kind responce.


Best Regards.
Emmanuel Kamara
messages.raw:
EMMANUEL KAMARA

messages.body:
EMPATHY



Dear Mr. Kamara,

I am so sad to hear about your unfortunate position. Of course I will be
willing to help you. I have a number of investment oppportunities at hand here
in Scandinavia, which you may find interesting. Among these is a very
promising method to cure the common cold, which is the most normal desease in
Northern Europe.

If I can help you - and in the same time help my project in which I have
already invested approx. $US 2 mio. - I will be happy to be assist you. Please
tell me how to proceed.


Sincerely,
Jakob Gott-Dam
messages.raw:
EMPATHY

JAKOB GOTT-DAM

Dear Mr. Kamara,

I am so sad to hear about your unfortunate position. Of course I will be willing to help you. I have a number of investment oppportunities at hand here in Scandinavia, which you may find interesting. Among these is a very promising method to cure the common cold, which is the most normal desease in Northern Europe.

If I can help you - and in the same time help my project in which I have already invested approx. $US 2 mio. - I will be happy to be assist you. Please tell me how to proceed.

Sincerely,
Jakob Gott-Dam

messages.body:
Dear Jakob Gott-Dam,


Sorry for the delay in replying your mail,this was
because of the ill-health of my mother.She was moved
to the hospital from the house of the humanitarian who
brought us out of the refugee camp.We initially moved
into the refugee camp in Cote d'Ivoire after the
attack of the rebels at our home in my country
Sierra-Leone.It was these rebels that killed my father
and looted all our property.


Since after the assasination of my father,my mother
developed a heart probem which is her illness now.I
hope she will have a better treatment in your country
as soon as we come over?.

This business is not illegal,for the money belongs to
my late father.We need you assistance as my late
father's associate to transfer this money out of this
country because if the people here discovers that this
money belongs to me and my mother alone, they may try
to share it with us since my father is dead .


The humanitarian who shelter us in his house has
arranged with a lawyer who will help to prepare the
change of ownership of the consignmet on your
behalf.As soon as this is achieved,the Eighteen
Million,Six Hundred Thaousand Dollars will be
transfered into any account of your choice as the
beneficiary.


Send immdiately an account number .Also with your
personal telephone and fax numbers for easier
communication with you.


Find enclosed my personal identity card and i will
like to recieve yours for better understanding.


Please this business will be confidential,you know
that some people are enemy of progress ,we lost every
thing we had during the attack of the rebels.


I awaits your response.


Best Regards


Emmanuel Kamara

EMMANUEL KAMARA

Since after the assasination of my father,my mother developed a heart probem which is her illness now.I hope she will have a better treatment in your country as soon as we come over?.

The humanitarian who shelter us in his house has arranged with a lawyer who will help to prepare the change of ownership of the consignmet on your behalf.As soon as this is achieved,the Eighteen Million,Six Hundred Thaousand Dollars will be transfered into any account of your choice as the beneficiary.

I awaits your response.

messages.body:
Dear Emmanuel Kamara,

I am so sad to learn that your mother is in such a bad state - I sincerely
hope that she wil be better soon.


I cannot send you a bank account number yet, as I need to make some discrete
arrangements first. To be honest, I have had some previous business which has
made the tax authorites very wary about what I do. For the same reason I am
also a little worried to use my phone. They probably do not tap it, but I do
not dare take any chances.


However, if you need to speak to me you may try to call my sister. Her name is
Nanna. Her phone number is 0045 4468 2380 . You can leave messages
for me there. (By the way: She saw your picture and said that she found you
very handsome and attractive, and she told me to ask you whether you are
married! I hope you are not offended. I like my sister very much (and she like
African men), so I have to ask you).


I shall try to get hold of a scanner so I can forward some ID to you. But I
would also like to see some more ID from you. To be honest to God I can not
know for sure if the picture you have send me is genuine. And as the
authorities may be looking at my every move, I have to be absolutely certain
that there is no foul play. To confirm that it is really you, please send a
new picture with you in front of the humanitarians house. And please hold a
copy of the latest local newspaper in your hand. (I trust that you are not
offended and appreciate my position).


As you can understand this operation is not quite risk free for me. I will
therefore also need to ask you for a higher percentage of the money. In fact,
I find that it will be more appropriate if we split the money 50/50. Please
let me know if you can agree on this.


Sincerely,
Jakob Gott-Dam
messages.raw:
INTRODUCING MY SISTER AND SOME HAGGLING

JAKOB GOTT-DAM

Dear Emmanuel Kamara,

I am so sad to learn that your mother is in such a bad state - I sincerely hope that she wil be better soon.

I cannot send you a bank account number yet, as I need to make some discrete arrangements first. To be honest, I have had some previous business which has made the tax authorites very wary about what I do. For the same reason I am also a little worried to use my phone. They probably do not tap it, but I do not dare take any chances.

However, if you need to speak to me you may try to call my sister. Her name is Nanna. Her phone number is 0045 4468 2380 [Note to Scamorama-users: Do not call this number. It is an expensive phone sex line]. You can leave messages for me there. (By the way: She saw your picture and said that she found you very handsome and attractive, and she told me to ask you whether you are married! I hope you are not offended. I like my sister very much (and she like African men), so I have to ask you).

I shall try to get hold of a scanner so I can forward some ID to you. But I would also like to see some more ID from you. To be honest to God I can not know for sure if the picture you have send me is genuine. And as the authorities may be looking at my every move, I have to be absolutely certain that there is no foul play. To confirm that it is really you, please send a new picture with you in front of the humanitarians house. And please hold a copy of the latest local newspaper in your hand. (I trust that you are not offended and appreciate my position).

As you can understand this operation is not quite risk free for me. I will therefore also need to ask you for a higher percentage of the money. In fact, I find that it will be more appropriate if we split the money 50/50. Please let me know if you can agree on this.

Sincerely,
Jakob Gott-Dam

messages.body:
Dear Jokob,

I got your response which did not come quick as I
expected and the lawyer is worried because of the
present political crises here which is on the rise.


The lawyer has instructed the bank here to transfer
the fund to Amsterdam because of the polititical
insterbility here and the transfer was made yesterday
to Holland waiting for the beneficiary to come up and
you will only have access to the fund immediately the
lawyer prepares a change of ownership of the fund on
your behalf.


Please this is a matter of life and death,for my
mother is very sick now in the hospital, we want to
make sure that we move out of this war country and
come over to Europe for the investment of this fund.


If you know that 25% is not enough for you assistance
please tell me immediately so that I will look for
another person from Europe to assist us because we
will not work with any person who is greedy.


If you are ready to work with us and have your 25%,you
have to immediately contact the lawyer who will
prepare the change of ownership of the fund on your
behalf, his name is Barrister Jude Solomon his email
address okezie_solis@hotmail.com.


Contact him and do not prove to be greedy to him,tell
him that you are the business associate of late
Johnson Kamara the father of Emmanuel Kamara that the
fund which was moved to Amsterdam belongs to you that
you will need his assistance to prepare the change of
ownership of the fund on your behalf.He will then give
you instructions on what to do.


I will not be able to call your sister because I do
not have access to make international calls and it
will be very dengerous if i go to the public phone
boot and start discussing this transaction it means
that we have no secret guiding the fund.


Tell your sister that my main problem now is to see
that this money in Holland is claimed so that we shall
have access to fund to do expenses both over there and
down here.


I discuss with her immediately all is nomalies.


Best Regards.


Emmanuel Kamara
messages.raw:
EMMANUEL KAMARA

Dear Jokob,

I got your response which did not come quick as I expected and the lawyer is worried because of the present political crises here which is on the rise.

The lawyer has instructed the bank here to transfer the fund to Amsterdam because of the polititical insterbility here and the transfer was made yesterday to Holland waiting for the beneficiary to come up and you will only have access to the fund immediately the lawyer prepares a change of ownership of the fund on your behalf.

Please this is a matter of life and death,for my mother is very sick now in the hospital, we want to make sure that we move out of this war country and come over to Europe for the investment of this fund.

If you know that 25% is not enough for you assistance please tell me immediately so that I will look for another person from Europe to assist us because we will not work with any person who is greedy.

If you are ready to work with us and have your 25%,you have to immediately contact the lawyer who will prepare the change of ownership of the fund on your behalf, his name is Barrister Jude Solomon his email address okezie_solis@hotmail.com.

Contact him and do not prove to be greedy to him,tell him that you are the business associate of late Johnson Kamara the father of Emmanuel Kamara that the fund which was moved to Amsterdam belongs to you that you will need his assistance to prepare the change of ownership of the fund on your behalf.He will then give you instructions on what to do.

I will not be able to call your sister because I do not have access to make international calls and it will be very dengerous if i go to the public phone boot and start discussing this transaction it means that we have no secret guiding the fund.

Tell your sister that my main problem now is to see that this money in Holland is claimed so that we shall have access to fund to do expenses both over there and down here.

I discuss with her immediately all is nomalies.

Best Regards.

Emmanuel Kamara

messages.body:
Dear Emmanuel Kamara,

I have to say I do not find my proposition greedy. It is simply a matter of
getting a payment for the risk I am taking. However, I will be willing to
accept a 55/45 split in your favour.


I can go to Holland with a very short warning. However, first I will still
need to ask you for some additional prove of your identity.


By the way, my sister hopes very much to meet you in Denmark - if you are not
married yet...


Kind regards,
Jakob Gott-Dam
messages.raw:
JAKOB GOTT-DAM

Dear Emmanuel Kamara,

I have to say I do not find my proposition greedy. It is simply a matter of getting a payment for the risk I am taking. However, I will be willing to accept a 55/45 split in your favour.

I can go to Holland with a very short warning. However, first I will still need to ask you for some additional prove of your identity.

By the way, my sister hopes very much to meet you in Denmark - if you are not married yet...

Kind regards,
Jakob Gott-Dam

messages.body:
Dear Emmanuel Kamara,

I am still very interested in entering the proposed deal with you. I will
accept 33% if you are interested too.


Regards,
Jakob Gott-Dam
messages.raw:
EMMANUEL KAMARA

Dear Emmanuel Kamara,

I am still very interested in entering the proposed deal with you. I will accept 33% if you are interested too.

Regards,
Jakob Gott-Dam

messages.subject: Confidential
messages.body:
THE MONEY




Dear Jakob Gott-Dam,

I got your mail which the content was well understood
but your request as regards the percentage is not
accepted.


You have to understand the whole situation.The lawyer
also have his own percentage because I did not pay him
any upfront fee before he accepted to give us his
legal assistance.


The lawyer has made a good arrangement and he have
accepted to send his assistance to Amsterdam.His
assistance will be in Amsterdam by tomorrow's night.


As soon as he arrives Amsterdam,you will join him to
meeting with the Diplomat who brought this consignment
to Amsterdam through their Diplomatic chennel.


According to the lawyer,the consignment is now in the
storage room of the security company in Amsterdam and
the beneficiary of the consignment have to pay the
clearance charges to the security company before we
carry the consignment.


The security company and the diplomat do not know that
the content of the box is money.It was decleared
before shifting to them that the content of the box is
valuable items because my late father used the same
channel in exporting Diamond to Europe when he was
alife.


The Charges the Diplomat is demanding for the lifting
of the consignment to Amsterdam is 9,750 Euro.We have
no money to pay this charges and the consignment was
lifted from here because of the political crises which
might disturb the transfer of the fund from here.


You are requested to arrange the 9,750euro and proceed
to Holland as soon as the lawyer arrives holland and
contacts you for the clearing of the consignment from
the storage room.


As soon as the consignment is cleared,the lawyer will
help you to open account in one of the fist class
banks in Amsterdam from where this fund will be
transfered into any account of your choice .


All expenses made from both parties will be deducted
from the total money before sharing.


I have also instructed the lawyer that, as soon as you
and him claim the consignmet,he will also send some
money to me here,so that I will be able to pay all my
mother's hospital bill,my travel expenses and we shall
start coming over for the investment.


Thank you and have a nice weekend.


Best Regards


Emmanuel
messages.raw:
THE MONEY JAKOB GOTT-DAM

Subject: Confidential

Dear Jakob Gott-Dam,

I got your mail which the content was well understood but your request as regards the percentage is not accepted.

You have to understand the whole situation.The lawyer also have his own percentage because I did not pay him any upfront fee before he accepted to give us his legal assistance.

The lawyer has made a good arrangement and he have accepted to send his assistance to Amsterdam.His assistance will be in Amsterdam by tomorrow's night.

As soon as he arrives Amsterdam,you will join him to meeting with the Diplomat who brought this consignment to Amsterdam through their Diplomatic chennel.

According to the lawyer,the consignment is now in the storage room of the security company in Amsterdam and the beneficiary of the consignment have to pay the clearance charges to the security company before we carry the consignment.

The security company and the diplomat do not know that the content of the box is money.It was decleared before shifting to them that the content of the box is valuable items because my late father used the same channel in exporting Diamond to Europe when he was alife.

The Charges the Diplomat is demanding for the lifting of the consignment to Amsterdam is 9,750 Euro.We have no money to pay this charges and the consignment was lifted from here because of the political crises which might disturb the transfer of the fund from here.

You are requested to arrange the 9,750euro and proceed to Holland as soon as the lawyer arrives holland and contacts you for the clearing of the consignment from the storage room.

As soon as the consignment is cleared,the lawyer will help you to open account in one of the fist class banks in Amsterdam from where this fund will be transfered into any account of your choice .

All expenses made from both parties will be deducted from the total money before sharing.

I have also instructed the lawyer that, as soon as you and him claim the consignmet,he will also send some money to me here,so that I will be able to pay all my mother's hospital bill,my travel expenses and we shall start coming over for the investment.

Thank you and have a nice weekend.

Best Regards

Emmanuel

messages.body:
Dear Emmanuel Kamara

The 7.590 euro is not a problem, and I can also be in Holland tomorrow night.
However, first I will need the requested extra assurance regarding your
identity.


Regards, Jakob Gott-Dam
messages.raw:
THE WRONG AMOUNT OF MONEY AND THE SUBJECT OF A PHOTO

JAKOB GOTT-DAM

Dear Emmanuel Kamara

The 7.590 euro is not a problem, and I can also be in Holland tomorrow night. However, first I will need the requested extra assurance regarding your identity.

Regards, Jakob Gott-Dam

messages.subject: Confidential
messages.body:
Mr Jekob,

I do not have a camera to take a photograph and where
we are is very far to the township and the lawyer
adviced me not to go out all the time because the
people that killed my father may be after me and my
mother.


It is the reason why the lawyer said that we should
meet face to face in Holland.


If you are not interested notify me immediately
because I have no time to waste and I will advice you
to keep my business secret.


I awaits your final answer.


Emmanuel

messages.body:
Mr. Emmanuel,

I am so sorry, but I cannot go to Holland without any further proof of your
identity or your sincerety. However, if you can find some other way to asure
me I will be more than willing to continue our venture, as I have already
cashed out the necessary money from my bank account.


Regards,
Jakob Gott-Dam

Regards,
Jakob Gott-Dam

messages.subject: Are you all right?
messages.body:
Mr. Emmanuel,

Considering the urgent situation, I cannot understand why I havent heard
anything from you in days.


I hope everything is well.


Kind regards,
Jakob Gott-Dam

messages.body:
THREAT #1


Dear Jakob ,

Considering your atitude towards the transaction.I
discovered that you are not matured to handle the
situation.


We have started looking for somebody who will be more
serious than you inEurope.


if you brocast this business to people because you are
no more interested to do it with us,my late father's
spirit will never live you unhurt.


Best Regard.


Emmanuel
messages.raw:
THREAT #1

EMMANUEL KAMARA

Dear Jakob ,

Considering your atitude towards the transaction.I discovered that you are not matured to handle the situation.

We have started looking for somebody who will be more serious than you inEurope.

if you brocast this business to people because you are no more interested to do it with us,my late father's spirit will never live you unhurt.

Best Regard.

Emmanuel

messages.body:
Dear Emmanuel Kamara,

I am still very interested in doing business with you! The only thing I ask
for is just a little more confirmation with respect to your identity. I trust
that you can appreciate that I cannot fly to Holland with almost 10.000 euros
in cash without knowing for sure who I am dealing with.


Sincerely,
Jakob Gott-Dam
messages.raw:
JAKOB GOTT-DAM

I am still very interested in doing business with you! The only thing I ask for is just a little more confirmation with respect to your identity. I trust that you can appreciate that I cannot fly to Holland with almost 10.000 euros in cash without knowing for sure who I am dealing with.

Sincerely,
Jakob Gott-Dam

messages.subject: Super urgent!
messages.body:
Dear Emmanuel Kamara,

I hope everything is all right. I must saym that it worries me a great deal
that you ignore me when I ask for a little extra assurance regarding your
identity. To be frank I am worried that you hav been trying to scam me.
Luckily I have logged your IP-address and will therefore hand over this
information to the very efficient IT-police in Denmark. As you may know they
have a good co-operation with Interpols IT-department.


Maybe I am all wrong. In that case please contact before the day is over.
Otherwise this information will be handed over to the police tonight.


Sincerely,
Jakob Gott-Dam
messages.raw:
JAKOB GOTT-DAM

Subject: Super urgent!

Dear Emmanuel Kamara,

I hope everything is all right. I must saym that it worries me a great deal that you ignore me when I ask for a little extra assurance regarding your identity. To be frank I am worried that you hav been trying to scam me. Luckily I have logged your IP-address and will therefore hand over this information to the very efficient IT-police in Denmark. As you may know they have a good co-operation with Interpols IT-department.

Maybe I am all wrong. In that case please contact before the day is over. Otherwise this information will be handed over to the police tonight.

Sincerely,
Jakob Gott-Dam

messages.body:
Dear Sir,

I can not entrust my wealth on somebody who have no
trust on himself.


What you are demading my lawyer adviced that you may
use the photogaph to st me up and stole my fund.


If you are ready to work me me follow my instruction.


If you like,call your police,the fund belongs to my
late father i did not steal it.


Emmanuel

Why should an extra photo of you give me opportunity to set you up? You have
already sent me a copy of your ID. I don't understand?!


Regards,
J. Gott-Dam

messages.subject: Super urgent!
messages.body:
THE LOVER BOY




Dear Sir,

May be I got the wrong information by contacting you
for this transaction.


When you where asked to provide your bank account,you
where only telling me about your sister when my
mother's health was at stake and the transfer of the
fund needs urgent attention.You only gave me your
sister's phone number as if I'm a lover boy.


Your atitude shows that you have no matured mind.You
where first asked to provide a bank account you
refused, again i asked you to go to Amsterdam with
fund you also refused demading picture from me again.


Be very careful,if you do not have a truthful mind.


If you want to invest this money with me,you have to
send to me 1000 euro so that i will buy my fright
ticket and wait for you at Dublin.As soon as you
arrive Dublin,we shall proceed to Amsterdam for the
clearing of the consignment for I'm not ready to be
down here and you will go to Amsterdam because I have
no more trust.


If you accept my condition,you send me an email so
that i will direct you how you will send the 1000euro
through western union money transfer.If you do not
accept,do not bother to contact me again so that i
will look for a capable hand and trustful person to
work with.


Have a nice weekend



Emmanuel
messages.raw:
THE LOVER BOY

EMMANUEL KAMARA

Subject: Super urgent!

May be I got the wrong information by contacting you for this transaction.

When you where asked to provide your bank account,you where only telling me about your sister when my mother's health was at stake and the transfer of the fund needs urgent attention.You only gave me your sister's phone number as if I'm a lover boy.

Your atitude shows that you have no matured mind.You where first asked to provide a bank account you refused, again i asked you to go to Amsterdam with fund you also refused demading picture from me again.

Be very careful,if you do not have a truthful mind.

If you want to invest this money with me,you have to send to me 1000 euro so that i will buy my fright ticket and wait for you at Dublin.As soon as you arrive Dublin,we shall proceed to Amsterdam for the clearing of the consignment for I'm not ready to be down here and you will go to Amsterdam because I have no more trust.

If you accept my condition,you send me an email so that i will direct you how you will send the 1000euro through western union money transfer.If you do not accept,do not bother to contact me again so that i will look for a capable hand and trustful person to work with.

Have a nice weekend

Emmanuel

messages.subject: My sincere apologies
messages.body:
IS EMMANUEL GAY?




Dear Emmanuel,

I am so sorry that I have offended you! I did not know that you do not like
women. But, to be honest with you it is fine with me that you are a
homosexual.


I am a little comfused about why we have to go to Dublin before we go to
Amsterdam. When I understand this I will transfer the money as soon as
possible.


Regards,
Jakob Gott-Dam
messages.raw:
IS EMMANUEL GAY? JAKOB GOTT-DAM

Subject: My sincere apologies

Dear Emmanuel,

I am so sorry that I have offended you! I did not know that you do not like women. But, to be honest with you it is fine with me that you are a homosexual.

I am a little comfused about why we have to go to Dublin before we go to Amsterdam. When I understand this I will transfer the money as soon as possible.

Regards,
Jakob Gott-Dam

messages.subject: My sincere apologies
messages.body:
My friend,

I will fly first to Dublin because that is the place
the travel-agent who is arranging my visa to Europe
has access to to obtain my visa from.They welcome
Africans well.


As soon as you also arrive Dublin we shall make
preparation to preceed to Amsterdam and we shall see
our self face to face before I can entrust the fund
into your posession.Because as soon as we clain the
consignment from the security company in Amsterdam and
i have access to make expenses.I will first of all
take some money from the total sum, I will first go
and look for my junior sister who was misplaced in
our country during the war so that she will join me in
Europe.


Have a nice weekend.


Emmanuel
messages.raw:
EMMANUEL KAMARA

Subject: My sincere apologies

My friend,

I will fly first to Dublin because that is the place the travel-agent who is arranging my visa to Europe has access to to obtain my visa from.They welcome Africans well.

As soon as you also arrive Dublin we shall make preparation to preceed to Amsterdam and we shall see our self face to face before I can entrust the fund into your posession.Because as soon as we clain the consignment from the security company in Amsterdam and i have access to make expenses.I will first of all take some money from the total sum, I will first go and look for my junior sister who was misplaced in our country during the war so that she will join me in Europe.

Have a nice weekend.

Emmanuel

messages.subject: Confused
messages.body:
A CONFUSING TRANSVESTITE




Dear Emmanuel,

I must say that you are confusing me.


When you wrote to me earlier, I was told that you would not come to Amsterdam
yuorself but that I should meet with Barrister Jude Solomon and tell him that
I was the business associate of late Johnson Kamara the father of Emmanuel
Kamara that the fund which was moved to Amsterdam belongs to me and that I
would need his assistance to prepare the change of ownership of the fund on my
behalf.


Now you are coming here via Dublin. I hope it is not because you think that I
am gay like you and interested in you. Because I have to tell you then that I
am a happily married man without any such wishes.


But come to think of it, it all adds up, when I see that you call yourself by
a womans name - Emma. I am sorry I did not notice that before. Hope I have not
offended your feelings.


Anyqays, please tell me what the plans are from here: Where should I send the
money, who should I contact, and where should I go. To be jonest I really need
to get hold of some extra money, as I am in debt to some rather rough people.


Sincerely,
Jakob Gott-Dam
messages.raw:
A CONFUSING TRANSVESTITE

JAKOB GOTT-DAM

Subject: Confused

Dear Emmanuel,

I must say that you are confusing me.

When you wrote to me earlier, I was told that you would not come to Amsterdam yuorself but that I should meet with Barrister Jude Solomon and tell him that I was the business associate of late Johnson Kamara the father of Emmanuel Kamara that the fund which was moved to Amsterdam belongs to me and that I would need his assistance to prepare the change of ownership of the fund on my behalf.

Now you are coming here via Dublin. I hope it is not because you think that I am gay like you and interested in you. Because I have to tell you then that I am a happily married man without any such wishes.

But come to think of it, it all adds up, when I see that you call yourself by a womans name - Emma. I am sorry I did not notice that before. Hope I have not offended your feelings.

Anyqays, please tell me what the plans are from here: Where should I send the money, who should I contact, and where should I go. To be jonest I really need to get hold of some extra money, as I am in debt to some rather rough people. Sincerely,
Jakob Gott-Dam

messages.subject: Treat urgent and confidential
messages.body:
INTRODUCING LARRY LAMIDO




Dear Friend,

I wanted to send only my lawyer to meet you in
Amsterdam but due to the warning I got from my mother
because my father was assasinated because of the trust
he had on his personal maneger.His maneger plotted for
his assasination in order to carry his wealth and that
is why we decieded to move this remaining fund to
Europe.


I think it will be better if we go to Amsterdam together.Then,as soon as we
claim the consignment,everybody will first take his expenses before we make
planns for the investment if you have a resonable idea.


If you insist that you do not want to go to Amsterdam
with me that you only want to meet the lawyer it means
you are up to something.


The name of the travel agent who will arrange my
travel documents is
Mr. Larry Lamido.
Address Lot 960 Marcory Abidjan, Cote d' Ivoire.
Tel. +22505331272
Send the money through western union money transfer,so
that the money will reach him the same day.As soon as
you send the money to him,send to my email box the
transfer information, so that i will tell him to go
and pick the money.


The travel agent knows how to prepare my papers and as
soon as they are ready,he will bring it to me because
I do not like going out all the time because the press
men used to disturb me on the streat any time they see
me.They used to ask my silly questions about my family
and if I know the killers of my father.


I awaits your response.


Have a nice weekend.


Emmanuel
messages.raw:
INTRODUCING LARRY LAMIDO EMMANUEL KAMARA

Subject: Treat urgent and confidential

Dear Friend,

I wanted to send only my lawyer to meet you in Amsterdam but due to the warning I got from my mother because my father was assasinated because of the trust he had on his personal maneger.His maneger plotted for his assasination in order to carry his wealth and that is why we decieded to move this remaining fund to Europe.

I think it will be better if we go to Amsterdam together.Then,as soon as we claim the consignment,everybody will first take his expenses before we make planns for the investment if you have a resonable idea.

If you insist that you do not want to go to Amsterdam with me that you only want to meet the lawyer it means you are up to something.

The name of the travel agent who will arrange my travel documents is
Mr. Larry Lamido.
Address Lot 960 Marcory Abidjan, Cote d' Ivoire.
Tel. +22505331272

Send the money through western union money transfer,so that the money will reach him the same day.As soon as you send the money to him,send to my email box the transfer information, so that i will tell him to go and pick the money.

The travel agent knows how to prepare my papers and as soon as they are ready,he will bring it to me because I do not like going out all the time because the press men used to disturb me on the streat any time they see me.They used to ask my silly questions about my family and if I know the killers of my father.

I awaits your response.

Have a nice weekend.

Emmanuel

messages.subject: Do I need an account number?
messages.body:
Dear Emma,

Do I not need some more information to send the money via Western Union. E.g.,
some sort of acoount number? Or can I just send it like that?


By the way, please assure me, that you do not want to go to the sinful city
Amsterdam to get me layed. I am not into that!! And also my sister - who is
already very sad that you do not want to meet her - will be very angry at me
as she is very jealous. (I am not "up to something" in any way). I would be
very good if you could call her from Larry Lamidos telephone, just to tell her
that you have nothing against her as a person and that you are not trying to
seduce me.


Another thing I do not understand: Should I not contact your lawyer anymore?
Is he also a cruel man who is trying to assassinate you? (I feel so sorry for
you; Your dad has been killed, your mother wounded, you are homosexual and
maybe you cannot even trust your lawyer). What about Dublin? Should I still
expect to go there? Can the man from the travel agency be trusted? Please tell
me, as I am afraid of meeting more nasty people.


How long after I send the travel money to you will you be in Amsterdam (or
Dublin)? Can we arrange it for next weekend?


I awaits your response in great anticipation.


Yours truly,
Jakob Gott-Dam
messages.raw:
JAKOB GOTT-DAM

Do I not need some more information to send the money via Western Union. E.g., some sort of acoount number? Or can I just send it like that?

And also my sister - who is already very sad that you do not want to meet her - will be very angry at me as she is very jealous. (I am not "up to something" in any way). I would be very good if you could call her from Larry Lamidos telephone, just to tell her that you have nothing against her as a person and that you are not trying to seduce me.

Another thing I do not understand: Should I not contact your lawyer anymore? Is he also a cruel man who is trying to assassinate you? (I feel so sorry for you; Your dad has been killed, your mother wounded, you are homosexual and maybe you cannot even trust your lawyer). What about Dublin? Should I still expect to go there? Can the man from the travel agency be trusted? Please tell me, as I am afraid of meeting more nasty people.

How long after I send the travel money to you will you be in Amsterdam (or Dublin)? Can we arrange it for next weekend?

I awaits your response in great anticipation.

Yours truly,
Jakob Gott-Dam

messages.body:
Dear Friend,

Please do not take this issue so long.As soon as you
send the money to the agent,I will be in Dublin by
next week.The lawyer has travelled for evacuation of
his family from this country because of political
tension which is on the rise.He will also meet us in
Holland.


The western union mony transfer do not need any
account number you have to go to their website and
locate their agents in your country
www.westernunion.com


Emmanuel
messages.raw:
EMMANUEL KAMARA

Dear Friend,

Please do not take this issue so long.As soon as you send the money to the agent,I will be in Dublin by next week.The lawyer has travelled for evacuation of his family from this country because of political tension which is on the rise.He will also meet us in Holland.

The western union mony transfer do not need any account number you have to go to their website and locate their agents in your country www.westernunion.com

Emmanuel

Dear Emma,

I have now transfered one thousand euros to Mr. Larre, Lot 96 Abidjan Maqory,
Cote d' Ivoire. When can I expect to see you in Dublin?


Please, do also answer my request regardng my sister. She really would like to
talk you!


Regards,
Jakob Gott-Dam

messages.body:
My Friend,

If you know that you have transfered the money the
western union agent in you area where you transfer the
money will give you a transfer code numbers and the
text question without this information Larry Lamido
will not get the money from their agent here.


So, if you know that you have sent money ask your
transfer agent to give you the control number and the
text question, so that larry will get the money as
soon as you send it.


If you want to work with me be very urgent because
delay is very dengerous


Emmanuel

EMMANUEL KAMARA

My Friend,

If you know that you have transfered the money the western union agent in you area where you transfer the money will give you a transfer code numbers and the text question without this information Larry Lamido will not get the money from their agent here.

So, if you know that you have sent money ask your transfer agent to give you the control number and the text question, so that larry will get the money as soon as you send it.

messages.subject: I still want to help
messages.body:
Dearest Emmanuel,

Please do not be angry. It seems like I have must have been making a mistake.
I just got a call from Western Union saying that the money I have tried to
transfer was transfered to an account that does not exist. They will now
transfer the money back.


I hope you will still let me help you.


Sincerely,
Jakob Gott-Dam
messages.raw:

Please do not be angry. It seems like I have must have been making a mistake. I just got a call from Western Union saying that the money I have tried to transfer was transfered to an account that does not exist. They will now transfer the money back.

I hope you will still let me help you.

Sincerely,
Jakob Gott-Dam

Emmanuel

messages.subject: Well...
messages.body:
Emma, my dear queer friend!

Not only are you gay and/or a transvestite. You do apparently also have a
problem with your temper and feelings. Yesterday you called me very nasty
things, the day before you were nice and the day before that you were slightly
irritated. And today you call me friend, but doesnt really mean it.


This has led me to believe that you belong to the infamous group of scammers
that have no shame and virtually no brain. Of course I was aware of the risk
of this all along. This is why I logged your IP address. And this is why I
tomorrow morning will send this information together with the address and
phone number of "Mr. Larry" to the relevant authorities.


Yours truly,
that God Damn Jakob

(sucker)

This has led me to believe that you belong to the infamous group of scammers that have no shame and virtually no brain. Of course I was aware of the risk of this all along. This is why I logged your IP address. And this is why I tomorrow morning will send this information together with the address and phone number of "Mr. Larry" to the relevant authorities.

Yours truly,
that God Damn Jakob

(sucker)
